title: Fantasy Grounds 5e Adventure Module: Below Vulture Point
description:
From Dungeon #39:
BELOW VULTURE POINT
BY JEFF FAIRBOURN
Bombers sighted, Twelve o'clock high!
â€œBelow Vulture Point" is an AD&D adventure designed for 6-9 player characters of zero to 1st level (about five total levels; zero-level PCs count as half a level). It takes place in the High Dale in the FORGOTTEN REALMS campaign setting, although it can easily be placed in any AD&D campaign as a beginning scenario. This adventure is designed to prepare zero-level PCs for the character classes that will most suit them when they reach 1st level. The plot centers on the urd, a monster detailed in the Monstrous Compendium.

converted to 5e, and ported to fantasy grounds. Suitable for level 1-2 pcs.

Please seed.

Also if you use it, please consider taking some time to convert another old Dungeon adventure and post it hereabouts, in trade. It took a really long time, but if everyone did one they'd be converted in no time
